titleStmt.title: His Majesties declaration to all his loving subjects; shewing his true intentions in advancing lately to Brainford: together with the answer of both Houses of Parliament to his message of the 12th of November; with His Majesties reply thereunto.
titleStmt.author: Falkland, Lucius Cary, Viscount, 1610?-1643.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I).
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: And by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Actually written by Lord Falkland -- Cf. Madan 1082.
Reprints "the Parliamentary petition of Nov. 9 received by the King on the 11th, his answer of the 11th, and his Message of Nov. 12." -- Cf. Madan 1082.
Another edition of: His Majesties declaration to all his loving subjects, of his true intentions in advancing lately to Brainceford.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
